title: For the love of a horse
brief_description: Follows the training and competition events of a 13 year-old girl and her horse as they prepare for equestrian trials. The girl’s trainer is Jim Elder, Canada’s Olympic gold medal winner, who explains the correct and incorrect procedures for equestrian riding. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
